ActFinancial Administration Act
PrecisAppointment of DELOITTE & TOUCHE LLP of Ottawa, Ontario, as auditor of the Public Sector Pension Investment Board for the fiscal year ending March 31, 2007; and appointment of the AUDITOR GENERAL OF CANADA as joint auditor of the Public Sector Pension Investment Board for the fiscal year ending March 31, 2007.
